Entries.AcceptGift_(O)20: %revealtasteGeorge20 Thank you, dear. Give this to George next time, I know he would enjoy it very much.
Entries.AcceptGift_category_flowers: Ah, don't they smell lovely...! I will find a lovely vase to put them in. Thanks, dear.$h
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)595: Oh my, I wouldn't mind a little visit from a friendly fairy! Maybe this will be just what I need to invite one over tea...$h#$e#I spotted one near your farm once, when I was much younger. Of course, it was your grandfather's at the time...
